thread.title: Speeding Comet wins Belmont Park feature
thread.title_full: Speeding Comet wins Belmont Park feature - Yahoo Sports

author: yahoo
title: Speeding Comet wins Belmont Park feature
text:
Done NEW YORK (AP) -- Speeding Comet streaked past Indian Brut to win the $77,000 allowance feature on the turf Sunday at Belmont Park.
A 4-year-old trained by John Toscano, Speeding Comet surged in deep stretch for a one-length victory, his fourth in 13 starts.
Irad Ortiz, Jr. was aboard for the seven furlongs in 1:22.80 on the firm course.
Speeding Comet paid $9, $4.10 and $2.90.
Indian Brut returned $7.80 and $5.90 while No Wunder paid $10 to show.
Sports & Recreation Comet   666/79545   83/5681   24/10000
